sys_variable_value.value: Your PR has been approved and a PO has been created

sys_element_mapping.value:
Dear Trigger➛Purchase request Record➛Opened by➛First name,

Kindly note that your Purchase Requested raised for "Trigger➛Purchase request Record➛Item name" has been approved by your manager.

A corresponding Purchase Order has been raised and the reference PO number in SAP ECC is "5➛SAP PO Number".

You can refer to the PO record to view the status in ServiceNow at anytime using this link:

 

 https://swt3demo.service-now.com/op?id=form&sys_id=4➛Purchase order Record➛Sys ID&table=x_snc_sap_a_p_au_0_purchase_order

Thank you.

Dear Trigger➛Purchase request Record➛Opened by➛First name,

Kindly note that your Purchase Requested raised for "Trigger➛Purchase request Record➛Item name" has not been approved by your manager. 

Thank you.

sys_variable_value.value: Your PR has been approved and a PO has been created

sys_element_mapping.value:
Dear Trigger➛Purchase request Record➛Opened by➛First name,

Kindly note that your Purchase Requested raised for "Trigger➛Purchase request Record➛Item name" has been approved by your manager.

A corresponding Purchase Order has been raised and the reference PO number in SAP ECC is "5➛SAP PO Number".

You can refer to the PO record to view the status in ServiceNow at anytime using this link:

 

 https://swt3demo.service-now.com/op?id=form&sys_id=4➛Purchase order Record➛Sys ID&table=x_snc_sap_a_p_au_0_purchase_order

Thank you.
